mapper.sql: select id, operator_role, operator_id, operator_name, prod_type, prod_id, date, operation_name, state, remark from i_oper
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, operator_role, operator_id, operator_name, prod_type, prod_id, date, operation_name, o.state, remark, point FROM i_oper o, paper p WHERE prod_id = 6144 AND prod_type = '学术论文' and o.prod_id = p.ID ORDER BY date
mapper.insert: insert into i_oper (operator_role, operator_id, operator_name, prod_type, prod_id, date, operation_name, state, remark) values (#{operatorRole}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatorName}, #{prodType}, #{prodId}, #{time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operationName}, #{state}, #{remark})
